overview: David Terei is currently pursuing a PhD in computer science at Stanford. He graduated from the University of New South Wales in Sydney with a bachelor in computer science. While in college he worked for Telstra eBusiness and SIRCA as a software engineer. After graduating he worked with Microsoft Research in the UK and IBM as a business consultant in Sydney. Silicon Valley called, though, so he moved to San Francisco and started at Stanford as a researcher. His research currently focuses on programming languages and security.
